items.title: Live and Work Legally, Secure Residency, & Unlock Local Benefits

items.description: Tired of legal uncertainty and risky setups? Live and operate legally in the UAE and unlock access to housing, utilities, healthcare, and financial services. Gain peace of mind knowing your residency and business are fully compliant, so you can focus on growth and opportunities.

items.description: Worried that setting up a business in the UAE could mean sharing equity and having no control over your business? Keep full legal control of your company, your structure, operations, and profits. No local sponsor, no equity sharing- just independent ownership.

items.description: Worried about frequent visa renewals disrupting your business plans? Qualify for a 5 to 10-year residency visa as your revenue grows, and continue to thrive in the country. Secure your long-term future with stability, freedom, and full control over your business and lifestyle.

items.title: Get a Free Eligibility Review

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to obtain a partner visa in the UAE?
items.answer: It typically takes 1-4 weeks to receive a UAE partner visa, depending on the readiness of the documents and the completion of medical tests.

items.question: How is a partner visa different from an investor visa?
items.answer: Both visas are functionally the same and are issued to individuals who own a UAE business. The terminology varies depending on the jurisdiction, which is why our experts help find the ideal visa solution.

items.question: Can I apply for a partner visa while I’m outside the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, you can kickstart the application process while abroad. Once your entry permit is issued, you can enter the country and complete the remaining procedures locally.

items.question: Do I need a local sponsor to obtain a partner visa?
items.answer: No. Most free zones and mainland structures offer 100% foreign ownership, meaning the visa is issued in your name as a legal shareholder.

items.question: Can I sponsor my family through a partner visa?
items.answer: Yes. Once your visa is active, you can sponsor your spouse, children, and dependents under your file.
